entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @washingtonpost I watched you Documentary years ago - Grandfather of German descent - saloon bar owner - gold rush - and people still called you racist. I knew you were the coolest, baddest and honorable president since JFK. #COVID19 numbers are those saved - be prepared for the unimaginable. https://t.co/LQ4A8igN2C
